no_name: The scenario does not have a name.
subject_start_type_error: Subject "{{subject}}" starts with nodes with different types ({{-types}}). The types must be the same.
end_with_outgoing_connections: Subject "{{subject}}" contains a node marked as an end that has outgoing connections.
unmarked_end: Subject "{{subject}}" contains a node without outgoing connections that has not been marked as an end node.
layer_start_type_error: Subjects on layer {{layerNumber}} start with nodes with different types ({{-types}}). The types must be the same.
special_node_layer_start_type_error: Subjects on layer {{layerNumber}} start with {{type}} nodes, but one of them contains a node with {{property}}, so they must start with player nodes.
special_node_previous_layer_start_type_e: Subjects on layer {{thisLayerNumber}} start with {{type}} nodes, but one of the subjects on layer {{previousLayerNumber}} contains a node with {{property}}, so they must start with player nodes.
optional_layer_start_type_error: Some subjects on layer {{previousLayerNumber}} are optional, so the type of start nodes of subjects on that layer must be the same as that of start nodes of subjects on layer {{thisLayerNumber}}. They are different ({{-types}}).

no_ending.single_subject: At least one node must be marked as an end.
no_ending.multiple_subjects: The last layer must have at least one node marked as an end.
